column3: Body of Carol Lynn Miller found, pubic hairs found.
Body of Cheryl Coker found, killer removed her right breast and left it beside her,found shoe prints at scene.
Body of Susan Sternfeld found, no mutilation, strangled.
Body of Kathleen Leslie Millne found at Lake Elsinore, she had been dead for lessthan 24 hours.
Body of Cherrie Payseur found in a bowling alley parking lot, she had a toiletplunger protruding from her vagina.
Body of Sherry Ann Latham found, strangled, found feline hairs on her.
A man suspected to be Suff in a grey van picked up a prostitute and she managed tojump out of the van and escape.
Picked up Kelly Marie Hammond, strangled her, body was still warm when policefound her.
Body of Catherine McDonald found, African American, Right breast cut off.
Body of Eleanore Casares found just down the street from the police station, rightbreast was missing.
Pulled over for an illegal U-turn and took to the police station.
Arraigned  at the Riverside Municipal Courthouse
Trial began before Judge Charles Morghan in the Riverside Hall of Justice.
Suff was convicted of 12 of the 13 counts of murder he was being tried for.  The triallasted for 4 months.  Jurors stated that the trial was emotionally draining.
